name: 郭五鳳
objective:
科技創新引領商業生態進入了智慧時代；敏捷的企業發展應以產業發展和全球經濟趨勢並重。學生將在此研討課中汲取國際商管知識，增進新興科技創新發展趨勢，以及探討企業商業策略的理念和實務個案。
The rapid development of technology innovation drives the business ecosystem into the era of including the information of intelligence and enterprises simultaneously. At the same time, the adoption of industrial trend and global economy trend has to be on the agile enterprises basis. In this course, students will gain knowledge on international business management, especially the trend and demand of emerging technological innovation.  Both theories and practical cases on business strategic development will be included in the course.
